title: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency through European Higher Education Peer Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of college-level foundational mathematics knowledge (calculus, linear algebra, etc.)
context.additional_context: A mathematics job competency enhancement program for working professionals, focusing on developing practical problem-solving skills and self-directed learning capabilities through peer feedback

learning_goals: Identify and correct logical flaws in mathematical problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy based on peer assessment feedback
Provide differentiated feedback across three or more dimensions (structural, content-based, motivational) for peer assignments
Improve final assignment completeness and applicability by over 30% through reflection on peer assessment results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
